titleStmt.title: SII 14.165: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 165. (A.R. No. 81 of 1907.) AMBĀSAMUDRAM, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE maṇḍapa IN THE TIRUMŪLANĀTHA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This is dated in the 20th year of Jaṭāvarmaṉ Sundara-Chōḷapāṇḍya and registers a gift of buffaloes by a private person for maintaining a lamp in the temple of Mūlastha-āṉ muḍaiyār at Tiruchchālaittuṟai in Rājarāja-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, a brahmadēya in Muḷḷi-nāḍu.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
r cuntaracoḻapāṇṭiyadevarkku yāṇṭu 2 10vatu Irājarājap pāṇṭi nāṭṭu muṭikoṇṭacoḻa vaḷanāṭṭu muḷḷiñāṭṭu brahmadeyam śrīirājarāja caturveti maṅkalattu tiruccālaittuṟai śrīmulastāṉa muṭaiya kkalakkuṟicci Irukkum veḷḷāḷaṉ kuṭiyan nācakaṉaic cārtti nācaṅkuṭiyāṉ vaicca viḷakku Arai Ivviḷakku Araiyiṉukkum vaicca cāvā muvā Erumai muṉṟuṅ koṇṭu Aṭṭuvatāṉa ney Āḻākkum In ney Āḻākkum Aṭṭuvatāṉeṉ Ivvūr Irukkum Iṭaiyaṉ
nney Āḻākkum Aṭṭuvatāṉeṉ . Inney celuttuvatarkkup puṇaip paṭṭeṉ śrī kuṟuṅkuṭidevar kuṭiniṉṟa varānāṭṭāṉeṉ cantirātittavalThis word appears to have been tagged on at the end, by mistake, its proper place being before �vadāṉēṉ. .
